p: TJN, ZJ, and NMF designed the study. IJ and KH provided information on the ethnopharmacology of Gynura and sources of Gynura research. TJN conducted the literature search, extracted the data, and wrote the first draft. ZJ and NMF oversaw the research project, including checking the research work, reviewing, and interpreting the results. SMS and FB provided methodological advice on the project (literature search, screening, and selection). All authors are involved in reviewing and approval of the final manuscript.
